10000000000100000000000000000000	//IN $1		Le input para $1
10001100001000000000000000000010	//LI $2 2	Counter
10001100001100000000000000000001	//LI $3 1	Result
10001100010000000000000000000101	//LI $4 5	Jump_Loop
10001100010100000000000000001001	//LI $5 9	Jump_End
00010000001000000100010100000000	//BGT $2 $1 $5	Go to Jump_End if Counter > N
00101100001100001000001100000000	//MUL $3 $2 $3	$3 = $2 * $3
11000000001000001000000000000001	//ADDI $2 $2 1	$2 = $2 + 1
10001000010000000000000000000000	//JR $4		Jump to Jump_Loop
10010000001100000000000000000000	//OUT $3	Printa $3
00100100000000000000000000000000	//HALT		Stop Processor
